object.name: setBusinessAccountUsername
object.description: Changes the username of a managed business account. Requires the can_change_username business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Changes the username of a managed business account. Requires the can_change_username business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Changes the username of a managed business account. Requires the *can_change_username* business bot right. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: The new value of the username for the business account; 0-32 characters
annotations.html_description: The new value of the username for the business account; 0-32 characters
annotations.rst_description: The new value of the username for the business account; 0-32 characters
annotations.name: username
